//news logs strings Failed to load users Try again No User User has been deleted Can\'t load user details Can\'t delete user Can\'t move user Can\'t fire user //onBoarding strings Speed limit warning The choice of a speed that does not correspond to road conditions, one of the most frequent causes of road accidents. Do not be destructed Answering calls or interacting with other car gadgets, the driver loses concentration. Allow permissions To correctly display the correct speed of your movement, you must provide the device with access to location. Next some description about app Get Started On boarding image
pref //Sign In strings Welcome to Strada Login with your Google account and get a pleasant experience from using our application. Skip Information Authentication is allowed to share and save your sound profile settings for a specific vehicle. The data is not confidential and is stored in Google services. Why use an account? Accept //Add car fragment You don\'t have cars in the list yet, click on the icon to add it Name of car Brand of car Model of car
